channel.title: Tuts down ima post it here for now
channel.description:
[b]Before Starting[/b] ---i recommend you download this... its great and helpful for editing JAVA files. [url=http://www.jcreator.com/download.htm]Jcreator[/url]
[b]1. Getting the Server[/b] Even Though Its My Source, I Dont Recommend It because it is mine, i recommend it because it is organised for new people... FOR INSTANCE - the commands are in sections [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,34806.0.html]Thatonesource[/url]
[b]2. The Obvious Part[/b] To Extract It Open It And Click Extract - thats why its called the obvious part. you MUST extract *(if your using my server you need winrar)*
[b]3. Getting It Ready[/b] Open The File that says "compile" - this will create the files that the server needs to read... every time you edit your server, you need to compile it so it recreates them. java files arent read by thethings, or else everything would be slow. compiling encrypts them so the server can read them.
[b]4. Making It Yours[/b] Try To Learn The Owner's Name That They Used On The Server, (mine is "vartankid") press ctrl+h(on notepad) that should open the replace screen. this is great for replacing large amounts of things. open it and in the first box put [b]Vartankid[/b](other sources~~he owners name) in the second part put the name you wish to use on the server. [b]if you get an error look down[/b]
press ctrl+f(search). search for [b]sendMessage("Welcome to[/b] and it should say welcome to (servername) edit the server name to the one you wish to use.
[b]5. Setting Your Variables And No-ip Account.[/b] If You Get A Error For Compile Look At Bottom For No-ip Setup Look At Bottom
[b]6. Running Your Server[/b] Run the file called "run" and it should say "starting up server" or something like that... if it doesnt than something is wrong with your computer LOL...
[b]7. Opening it to others[/b]
---[b]With a no-ip account[/b] Tell people that your ip is the one you put on the no-ip account
---[b]Without no-ip[/b] go to http://www.whatismyip.com and tell people to go to the ip that it lists there.
[b]MORE STUFF[/b]
~~~~~
[b]Compile Error[/b] 1. Right Click MY COMPUTER 2. Click Properties - a menu will pop up 3. Click Advanced In The Menu 4. Click On The Environment Variables Button On The Bottom of menu 5. Click NEW 6. Variable Name = [b]Classpath[/b]\\Variable Value=[b]SET CLASSPATH=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07in;%CLASSPATH%;. [/b] -----[i]INCLUDES THE SET CLASSPATH= PART!!![/i]
7. Click NEW again 8. Variable Name = [b]Path[/b]\\[b]Variable Value=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07in;C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_07in[/b] ----[i]Almost Done[/i] 9. Press the OK button until no more menus are open and compile should work when you re-open it!
~~~~~~~~~ [b]Setting Up A No-ip[/b] 1. Go To www.no-ip.com and register an account. 2. Login and there will be an option "add" 3. For Hostname Put The first part [b]Thatoneserver[/b].no-ip.org 4. Put the extention in the second part thatoneserver[b].no-ip.org[/b] 5. Press Create Host 6. Go Back To The Homepage and click "downloads", Select your operating system. 7. run it and login! 8. Enjoy ~~~~~~~~~ i will add tons of stuff soon!!!![br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 05:36:29 PM[/size][hr]anyone else not able to go on tut section?

item.title: Tuts down ima post it here for now
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Before Starting
—i recommend you download this… its great and helpful for editing JAVA files. Jcreator

1. Getting the Server
Even Though Its My Source, I Dont Recommend It because it is mine, i recommend it because it is organised for new people… FOR INSTANCE - the commands are in sections
Thatonesource

2. The Obvious Part
To Extract It Open It And Click Extract - thats why its called the obvious part. you MUST extract
(if your using my server you need winrar)

3. Getting It Ready
Open The File that says “compile” - this will create the files that the server needs to read… every time you edit your server, you need to compile it so it recreates them. java files arent read by thethings, or else everything would be slow. compiling encrypts them so the server can read them.

4. Making It Yours
Try To Learn The Owner’s Name That They Used On The Server, (mine is “vartankid”)
press ctrl+h(on notepad) that should open the replace screen. this is great for replacing large amounts of things. open it and in the first box put Vartankid(other sources~~he owners name) in the second part put the name you wish to use on the server. if you get an error look down

press ctrl+f(search). search for sendMessage("Welcome to and it should say welcome to (servername) edit the server name to the one you wish to use.

5. Setting Your Variables And No-ip Account.
If You Get A Error For Compile Look At Bottom
For No-ip Setup Look At Bottom

6. Running Your Server
Run the file called “run” and it should say “starting up server” or something like that…
if it doesnt than something is wrong with your computer LOL…

7. Opening it to others

—With a no-ip account
Tell people that your ip is the one you put on the no-ip account

—Without no-ip
go to http://www.whatismyip.com and tell people to go to the ip that it lists there.

MORE STUFF


[b]Compile Error[/b]
1. Right Click MY COMPUTER
2. Click Properties - a menu will pop up
3. Click Advanced In The Menu
4. Click On The Environment Variables Button On The Bottom of menu
5. Click NEW
6. Variable Name = [b]Classpath[/b]\\Variable Value=[b]SET CLASSPATH=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07in;%CLASSPATH%;. [/b]
-----[i]INCLUDES THE SET CLASSPATH= PART!!![/i]

7. Click NEW again
8. Variable Name = [b]Path[/b]\\[b]Variable Value=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07in;C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_07in[/b]
----[i]Almost Done[/i]
9.  Press the OK button until no more menus are open and compile should work when you re-open it!

Setting Up A No-ip

  1. Go To www.no-ip.com and register an account.
  2. Login and there will be an option “add”
  3. For Hostname Put The first part Thatoneserver.no-ip.org
  4. Put the extention in the second part thatoneserver.no-ip.org
  5. Press Create Host
  6. Go Back To The Homepage and click “downloads”, Select your operating system.
  7. run it and login!
  8. Enjoy
i will add tons of stuff soon!!!![br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 05:36:29 PM[/size][hr]anyone else not able to go on tut section?

Read full topic
